message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I believe it's worth a significant amount to you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $2000000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. Is that something we can work with?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1900000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and what I'm looking to get out of the sale.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1700000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't think I can go any higher than that.
